about:
Hi, I'm Ayush, an undergraduate student studying Computer Science and Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Dharwad with a keen interest in software development, artificial intelligence, and system architecture.

My technical skills span multiple languages, including C, C++, Python, Java, and JavaScript, along with expertise in full-stack development using HTML/CSS, React, Flask, and MySQL. I’m also proficient in Bash scripting, Git, LaTeX, simulation tools like MATLAB and Simulink, and much more.

In addition to my technical pursuits, I’ve secured top positions in multiple competitive coding events. My academic journey is marked by prestigious awards, including NTSE and KVPY scholarships, merit distinctions in several national and international science competitions like IJSO, IESO, INAO, NMTC, ICAS, ANCQ, etc.
